data.name: Single room self contained
data.description:
Located in the resort-like community on the Atlantic Ocean Oceana Condominium' +
            ' and Club this prime 3 bedroom / 3 baths residence boasts two exposures with direct ocean pages, ' +
            'a balcony, separate bathroom wings and a large island windowed kitchen. The apartment features oversized windows,' +
            ' high ceilings, huge walk in closets, beautiful hardwood floors and oversized marble baths with marble vanities. ' +
            'Plus a washer /dryer in the unit. This luxury gated security community offers every amenity including the ' +
            'Oceana outdoor pool and Great Lawn, and a spectacular indoor 65 foot long lap pool, ' +
            'with skylights and Roman columns, members lounge and health club, ' +
            'both overlook the pool and Atlantic ocean, direct beach access, and on-site parking. ' +
            'Express train to Manhattan and easy access to major highways.'
